title: HP Extends Global Threat Intelligence Sharing Platform Through Alliance with Hitachi (Hewlett-Packard Suisse Sàrl)
text: ( Source : Hewlett-Packard Suisse Sàrl ) PALO ALTO , Calif. , October 6, 2015 - Extending the reach of its security intelligence sharing network, HP has formed an alliance with Hitachi designed to capture and share Japan-specific threat
